definition: independent and autonomous (idiom); self-determination/to act independently/to maintain control over one's own affairs
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: First, China sticks to the principle of independence.
sentences.chinese: 第一，中國始終奉行獨立自主的原則。

sentences.english: You are a good catch if you are self-reliant.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是一個獨立自主的人，你就是一個搶手貨。

sentences.english: The independency is the magic weapon supporting China's sovereignty and safety.
sentences.chinese: 獨立自主是維護中國主權與安全的法寶。

sentences.english: Conclusions: Multiple factors contribute to the functional independence of residents in long-term care facilities.
sentences.chinese: 多重因素影響長期照護機構院民功能獨立自主之能力。

sentences.english: Her father was a quiet self-contained man.
sentences.chinese: 她父親生前是個好靜而獨立自主的人。

sentences.english: Theoretically the corporative bodies should be autonomous .
sentences.chinese: 理論上這些法人團體應該是獨立自主的。

sentences.english: Uphold principles of independence and self-management of China's religious undertakings.
sentences.chinese: 堅持宗教獨立自主自辦原則。

sentences.english: Before the opium war China is still an independent state of feudal society.
sentences.chinese: 鴉片戰爭前，中國仍是一個獨立自主的封建制國家。

sentences.english: Our factory pursues the principle of independence, initiative and self-reliance.
sentences.chinese: 應該堅持獨立自主和平等互利原則。

sentences.english: We, the Chinese people, regard independence as the foundation on which to build the country.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民把獨立自主當作立國之本。

sentences.english: Self-directed learners do not always act autonomously or independently.
sentences.chinese: 自主學者並不總是獨立自主地學習。

sentences.english: They've always prided themselves on their hard work and independence.
sentences.chinese: 他們總是對他們辛勤的工作和獨立自主感到驕傲。

sentences.english: Also a case in point is that China independently developed its atomic and hydrogen bombs and man- made satellites.
sentences.chinese: 中國獨立自主地開發“兩彈一星”也證明了這一點。

sentences.english: I intend sovereignty of energy flow and non-attachment in my dream.
sentences.chinese: 我意願我能量流的獨立自主以及我夢想的毫無連線。

sentences.english: This is the extension of Step 2, one perfers to more free time.
sentences.chinese: 這是第二個階段的延續，要求更多獨立自主的時間。

sentences.english: Our factory pursues the principle of independence, initiative and self-reliance.
sentences.chinese: 本廠奉行獨立自主，自力更生的原則。

definition: ability to make one's own decisions
(abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
abreast of modern developments/to keep up with the times/progressive/timely
